name: Arun, the Lotus Guardian - Demo
description:
ARUN, THE LOTUS GUARDIAN - DEMO Travel across the rainforest flowering lotus!

You are Arun, an elephant guardian of the Lotus Forest.

Move on tiles. Interact with windmills to modify your environment. Flower the lotus by spreading water with your trunk!

Flower all the lotus and reach the end tile to complete a level.

Controls

Move with WASD or with the directional arrows.

Drink water, interact with windmills and flower lotus with Space or E.

This is a demo. There are 10 levels at the moment, more will be added in the future. Credits

Lisa Fontaine : Game Design, Programming, Levels
